item.title: Contact
item.description: Hello, curious reader. You’ve made it this far and want to get in contact with us ? Great !! You can contact the project leader on: an <dot> braeken <at>vub<dot>be

item.title: Planning
item.description: A Gantt-chart of the planning in Trusted IoT can be seen below. The project started on September 1st, 2022. WP 1: Project Management D 1.1 (M1): Reports of Meetings and Discussions WP 2: Exploration, Specification & Requirements study WP 3: Platform-specific security solutions WP 4: Industrial Use Case Demonstration WP 5: Dissemination and Exploitation M 5.1 (M3): Kick-off meeting + project website the kick-off meeting took place on Septebmer 15, 2022 in Brussels.

item.title: Academic Partners
item.description: In Trusted IoT, the research is conducted by 5 parters from Belgium and Germany. Belgian Partners Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB) Name of research group An Braeken, Laurent Segers, Bruno da Silva, and Abdellah Touhafi KU Leuven Emerging technologies, Systems and Security (ES&S) Nele Mentens, Masoom Rabbani and Jo Vliegen German Partners Brandenburg University of Technology Cottbus-Senftenberg Fachgebiet Technische Informatik Marc Reichenbach and Safdar Mahmood Technische Universit√§t Dresden Adaptive Dynamic systems
